row.process: : SET &UC4RB_AIOPS_DISK_USED# = "" : SET &UC4RB_AIOPS_DISK_UNUSED# = "" : SET &UC4RB_AIOPS_DISK_UNUSED_PCENT# = "" : SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") : IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &HND#=PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS", , "REP","UC4RB_FS_DISK*","COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &KEY# = "UC4RB_FS_DISK_USED" : SET &UC4RB_AIOPS_DISK_USED# = &VALUE# : ELSE : IF &KEY# = "UC4RB_FS_DISK_UNUSED" : SET &UC4RB_AIOPS_DISK_UNUSED# = &VALUE# : ELSE : IF &KEY# = "UC4RB_FS_DISK_UNUSEDPER" : SET &UC4RB_AIOPS_DISK_UNUSED_PCENT# = &VALUE# : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# : ENDIF : PUBLISH &UC4RB_AIOPS_DISK_UNUSED#,,WORKFLOW : PUBLISH &UC4RB_AIOPS_DISK_USED#,,WORKFLOW : PUBLISH &UC4RB_AIOPS_DISK_UNUSED_PCENT#,,WORKFLOW
